title: TUI refactor: Extract Picker trait
description: ProviderPicker, ModelPicker, SessionPicker share 80%+ identical structure (filter_input, selection, items, filtered, move_up/down, jump_to_top/bottom). Create generic FilterablePicker<T>. Saves ~400 lines.

logs.msg: Sprint 14 design complete. FilterablePicker<T> generic will unify ProviderPicker (133), ModelPicker (404), SessionPicker (166). ~300 lines saveable.
